contract_details.description: Comprehensive cloud infrastructure optimization and migration strategy to enhance scalability, reduce costs, and improve system performance through advanced cloud-native architectures.
contract_details.background: Current infrastructure needs cloud optimization to achieve better scalability, cost efficiency, and performance through modern cloud-native patterns and services.
objectives: Assess current infrastructure and identify cloud migration opportunities
Design cloud-native architecture for improved scalability and resilience
Implement cost optimization strategies and resource management
Establish automated scaling and load balancing solutions
Configure monitoring and logging for cloud infrastructure
Implement disaster recovery and backup strategies in cloud
deliverables: Cloud infrastructure assessment report with migration roadmap
Cloud-native architecture design and implementation plan
Cost optimization analysis and implementation strategy
Automated scaling and load balancing configuration
Cloud monitoring and alerting system implementation
Disaster recovery and backup strategy documentation
technical_requirements: Cloud platforms (AWS, Azure, GCP) and services
Monitoring and logging platforms (CloudWatch, Azure Monitor)
Security and compliance frameworks for cloud
Cost optimization and resource management tools
success_criteria: Cloud infrastructure assessment completed with clear migration path
Cloud-native architecture implemented with improved scalability
Cost optimization achieved with 20%+ cost reduction target
Automated scaling working with 99% uptime during load changes
Cloud monitoring providing real-time infrastructure visibility
Disaster recovery procedures tested and operational

dependencies: Cloud platform access and permissions configured
Budget approval for cloud migration obtained
Security requirements for cloud migration defined
resources_required: Cloud platform accounts and access credentials

network_unlocks: Access to Cloud Infrastructure Working Group

contract_history.details: Contract auto-generated from Cloud Infrastructure Optimization & Migration template
